page.title: 11SCHOOLS
page.content:
Hartly and a Deputy Head and 9 teachers The whole school has 9 classrooms. They have showers for both boys and girls. They have 224 children at present and there will be 123 children coming up in September.The school is being closed in July 1985 and so does Keyworth Infant School.The new Keywoth Primary School will open in September 1985.
KEYWORTH INFANT SCHOOL Keyworth Infant School is a Victorian building it has been going over a 100 years.Now it has a newer section which was built in the 1960s. The children age between 6 and 7 are taught in the older part of the building and the children 5 to 6 are taught in the newer part of the building. There are 8 staff.
